title: A Correct-and-Certify Approach to Self-Supervise Object Pose Estimators via Ensemble Self-Training. (arXiv:2302.06019v2 [cs.CV] UPDATED)
abstract: Real-world robotics applications demand object pose estimation methods that work reliably across a variety of scenarios. Modern learning-based approaches require large labeled datasets and tend to perform poorly outside the training domain. Our first contribution is to develop a robust corrector module that corrects pose estimates using depth information, thus enabling existing methods to better generalize to new test domains; the corrector operates on semantic keypoints (but is also applicable to other pose estimators) and is fully differentiable. Our second contribution is an ensemble self-training approach that simultaneously trains multiple pose estimators in a self-supervised manner. translated_abstract: 真实世界中的机器人应用需要能够在各种场景中可靠工作的目标姿态估计方法。现代基于学习的方法需要大量的标记数据集，并且在训练域外表现不佳。本文的第一个贡献是开发出一个鲁棒的纠正模块，使用深度信息纠正姿态估计，从而使现有方法更好地推广到新的测试域;纠正器在语义关键点上操作（但也适用于其他姿态估计器），并且是完全可微的。我们的第二个贡献是一种集成自我训练方法，可以同时训练多个姿态估计器。我们的集成自训练架构使用强大的纠正器来改进每个姿态估计器的输出;然后，使用可观测的正确证书评估输出质量；最后，使用可观测正确的输出进行进一步的训练，而无需外部超级
tldr: 本文提出了一种可以更好地推广到新测试域的鲁棒纠正模块和同时训练多个姿态估计器的自监督集成方法。
